description: Zero-config Tailwind CSS v4 integration for Blazor. Auto-downloads the CLI, generates CSS at build time via MSBuild, and runs watch mode in development. No Node.js required.
rules: Always register TailwindBlazor via builder.UseTailwind() in Program.cs, not by manually adding services
Create a Styles/app.css file with @import "tailwindcss" as the CSS entry point before building
Reference the generated CSS with <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/tailwind.css" /> in App.razor or _Host.cshtml
Do NOT install Node.js or npm — TailwindBlazor downloads the standalone Tailwind CLI binary automatically
Tailwind CSS v4 does NOT require a tailwind.config.js file — it detects content files automatically
